content: आहित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Placed, set, deposited; मनस्याहितकर्तव्याः <ls>Ku. 2. 62</ls> bearing in mind what they had to do; भारतीमाहितभरां <ls>Śi. 2. 69</ls> full of deep meaning. {@--2@} Given, imparted. {@--3@} Entertained, felt. {@--4@} Comprising, containing. {@--5@} Performed, done.
